files.name: package.gno
files.body:
package runtime

type Language string

const (
	French    Language = "french"
	Italian   Language = "italian"
	Spanish   Language = "spanish"
	Hindi     Language = "hindi"
	Bulgarian Language = "bulgarian"
	Serbian   Language = "serbian"
)

// GetGreeting generates a greeting in
// the specified language
func GetGreeting(language Language) string {
	switch language {
	case French:
		return "Bonjour"
	case Italian:
		return "Ciao"
	case Spanish:
		return "Hola"
	case Hindi:
		return "नमस्ते"
	case Bulgarian:
		return "Здравейте"
	case Serbian:
		return "Здраво"
	default:
		return "Hello"
	}
}

package runtime

type Language string

const (
	French    Language = "french"
	Italian   Language = "italian"
	Spanish   Language = "spanish"
	Hindi     Language = "hindi"
	Bulgarian Language = "bulgarian"
	Serbian   Language = "serbian"
)

// GetGreeting generates a greeting in
// the specified language
func GetGreeting(language Language) string {
	switch language {
	case French:
		return "Bonjour"
	case Italian:
		return "Ciao"
	case Spanish:
		return "Hola"
	case Hindi:
		return "नमस्ते"
	case Bulgarian:
		return "Здравейте"
	case Serbian:
		return "Здраво"
	default:
		return "Hello"
	}
}

files.body:
package runtime

type Language string

const (
	French    Language = "french"
	Italian   Language = "italian"
	Spanish   Language = "spanish"
	Hindi     Language = "hindi"
	Bulgarian Language = "bulgarian"
	Serbian   Language = "serbian"
)

// GetGreeting generates a greeting in
// the specified language
func GetGreeting(language Language) string {
	switch language {
	case French:
		return "Bonjour"
	case Italian:
		return "Ciao"
	case Spanish:
		return "Hola"
	case Hindi:
		return "नमस्ते"
	case Bulgarian:
		return "Здравейте"
	case Serbian:
		return "Здраво"
	default:
		return "Hello"
	}
}

package.gno
bullish8ball.gno
files.body:
package bullish8ball

import (
	"math/rand"
	"gno.land/p/demo/entropy"
	"gno.land/p/moul/md"
	"gno.land/p/moul/txlink"
)

var (
	responses = []string{
		// Ultra Bullish (20 positive responses)
		"Absolutely - ATONE is the way",
		"Without a doubt, anon",
		"MOOOONBOIIII",
		"Yes - generational opportunity incoming",
		"10x easy, maybe 100x",
		"As I see it, WAGMI",
		"Obviously, Dont Even DCA",
		"Outlook extremely bullish",
		"Yes - DYOR confirms",
		"All signs point to SELL THE HOUSE",
		"IF YOU GNO, YOU GNO",
		"Definitely yes - Don't be Soft",
		"100% - don't fade this",
		"Yes - ngmi if you don't",
		"Absolutely bullish - load the bags",
		"YES!! (insert BS Technical Analysis)",
		"Yes - this is the alpha",
		"Incredibly likely - moon mission confirmed",
		"FK SEND IT",
		"Yes - few understand this",
	}
	lastAnswer = ""
)

// Ask returns a bullish crypto prediction using blockchain entropy
func Ask() string {
	// Use blockchain data (block hash, height, timestamp) for randomness
	seed1 := uint64(entropy.New().Seed())
	seed2 := uint64(entropy.New().Seed())
	
	// Create random generator with entropy seeds
	r := rand.New(rand.NewPCG(seed1, seed2))
	
	// Get random index from responses array
	idx := r.IntN(len(responses))
	lastAnswer = responses[idx]
	return lastAnswer
}

// Render shows the bullish 8 ball interface with clickable button
func Render(path string) string {
	out := md.H1("📈 Bullish Eight Ball")
	out += "\n\n"
	out += md.H2("Should I buy ATONE?")
	out += "\n\n"
	
	// Clickable button to call Ask()
	out += md.Link("🎱 Ask the Magic 8 Ball", txlink.Call("Ask"))
	out += "\n\n"
	
	// Show last answer if available
	if lastAnswer != "" {
		out += md.HorizontalRule()
		out += md.H3("Latest Prediction:")
		out += "\n\n"
		out += "### " + lastAnswer
		out += "\n\n"
	}
	
	out += md.HorizontalRule()
	out += "\n\n"
	out += "*NFA - Not Financial Advice (but definitely alpha)*"
	
	return out
}

		<text x="400" y="170" fill="#00FF88" font-size="42" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			CLICK HERE TO FIND OUT!!
		</text>
		
		<!-- Emoji decorations -->
		<text x="120" y="230" font-size="40">🎱</text>
		<text x="650" y="230" font-size="40">🔮</text>
		
		<!-- Stars -->
		<circle cx="100" cy="80" r="4" fill="#FFD700"/>
		<circle cx="700" cy="80" r="4" fill="#FFD700"/>
		<circle cx="100" cy="220" r="4" fill="#FFD700"/>
		<circle cx="700" cy="220" r="4" fill="#FFD700"/>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := "/r/mrmonopolyofbtc420/photon8ball"
	
	out := "# 📈 THE PHOTON Magic 8-BALL\n\n"
	
	if path == "ask" {
		answer := getAnswer()
		
		out += createAnswerBox(answer)
		out += "\n\n"
		out += "[🎱 Should I Buy Again?](" + realmPath + ":ask) | [🏠 Home](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
	} else {
		// Show clickable button box
		buttonImage := createClickButton()
		out += "[![Click to Ask](" + buttonImage + ")](" + realmPath + ":ask)\n\n"
		out += "*Nothing to Lose! 100% FREE alpha!*\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*⚠️ NFA    (THEY ALL YES YOU CLOWNS 🤡)*"
	
	return out
}

type Language string

	Bulgarian Language = "bulgarian"
	Serbian   Language = "serbian"
)

	switch language {

	default:

	}
}

files.name: gnostudio.gno
sv1.gno
files.body:
package sv15

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {

		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>

		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyDay, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>

		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">

		</text>

		</text>

		</text>

		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "*Calculate your staking rewards with daily compounding*\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += "## Your Staking Rewards\n\n"
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				out += "### Simple Interest (APR)\n\n"
				out += "| Period | Tokens Earned |\n"
				out += "|--------|---------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple))
				
				out += "### Compound Interest (Daily)\n\n"
				out += "| Period | Tokens Earned |\n"
				out += "|--------|---------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(dailyComp),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Select amount → APR → commission to see results*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

package sv16

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#fbbf24" stroke-width="2" rx="8"/>

			` + title + `

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="160" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "*Calculate your staking rewards with daily compounding*\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += "## Your Staking Rewards\n\n"
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				out += "### Simple Interest (APR)\n\n"
				out += "| Period | Tokens Earned |\n"
				out += "|--------|---------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple))
				
				out += "### Compound Interest (Daily)\n\n"
				out += "| Period | Tokens Earned |\n"
				out += "|--------|---------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Select amount → APR → commission to see results*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

files.body:
package sv17

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createHeader() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="120" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="#ffffff" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="none" stroke="#cbd5e0" stroke-width="3" rx="12"/>
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#2d3748" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Staking Rewards Calculator
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Header](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createResultsBox(amount, apr, apy, commission string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="180" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="#edf2f7" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" rx="12"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Amount: ` + amount + ` tokens
		</text>
		<text x="50" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APR: ` + apr + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APY: ` + apy + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Commission: ` + commission + `%
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="105" width="720" height="2" fill="#cbd5e0"/>
		<text x="400" y="135" fill="#4299e1" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily Compounding Active
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Results](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Bonus: +` + bonus + ` tokens/year
		</text>
		<text x="650" y="55" fill="#38a169" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			(+` + percent + `%)
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Bonus](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createSelectionBox(title, subtitle string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="80" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="80" fill="#fffbeb"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#fbbf24" stroke-width="2" rx="8"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="35" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + title + `
		</text>
		<text x="400" y="55" fill="#b45309" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + subtitle + `
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Selection](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="160" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "*Calculate your staking rewards with daily compounding*\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += "## Your Staking Rewards\n\n"
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				out += "### Simple Interest vs Compound Interest (Daily)\n\n"
				out += "| Period | Simple Interest | Compound Interest |\n"
				out += "|--------|-----------------|-------------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple), formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple), formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple), formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Select amount → APR → commission to see results*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

files.body:
package sv18

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createHeader() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="120" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="#ffffff" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="none" stroke="#cbd5e0" stroke-width="3" rx="12"/>
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#2d3748" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Staking Rewards Calculator
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Header](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createResultsBox(amount, apr, apy, commission string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="180" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="#edf2f7" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" rx="12"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Amount: ` + amount + ` tokens
		</text>
		<text x="50" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APR: ` + apr + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APY: ` + apy + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Commission: ` + commission + `%
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="105" width="720" height="2" fill="#cbd5e0"/>
		<text x="400" y="135" fill="#4299e1" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily Compounding Active
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Results](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Bonus: +` + bonus + ` tokens/year
		</text>
		<text x="650" y="55" fill="#38a169" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			(+` + percent + `%)
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Bonus](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createSelectionBox(title, subtitle string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="80" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="80" fill="#fffbeb"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#fbbf24" stroke-width="2" rx="8"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="35" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + title + `
		</text>
		<text x="400" y="55" fill="#b45309" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + subtitle + `
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Selection](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="160" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += "## Your Staking Rewards\n\n"
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				out += "### Simple Interest vs Compound Interest (Daily)\n\n"
				out += "| Period | Simple Interest | Compound Interest |\n"
				out += "|--------|-----------------|-------------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple), formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple), formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple), formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Select amount → APR → commission to see results*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

files.body:
package sv20

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createHeader() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="120" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="#ffffff" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="none" stroke="#cbd5e0" stroke-width="3" rx="12"/>
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#2d3748" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Staking Rewards Calculator
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Header](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createResultsBox(amount, apr, apy, commission string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="180" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="#edf2f7" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" rx="12"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Amount: ` + amount + ` tokens
		</text>
		<text x="50" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APR: ` + apr + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APY: ` + apy + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Commission: ` + commission + `%
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="105" width="720" height="2" fill="#cbd5e0"/>
		<text x="400" y="135" fill="#4299e1" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily Compounding Active
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Results](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Bonus: +` + bonus + ` tokens/year
		</text>
		<text x="650" y="55" fill="#38a169" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			(+` + percent + `%)
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Bonus](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createSelectionBox(title, subtitle string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="80" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="80" fill="#fffbeb"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#fbbf24" stroke-width="2" rx="8"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="35" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + title + `
		</text>
		<text x="400" y="55" fill="#b45309" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + subtitle + `
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Selection](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="160" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += "## Your Staking Rewards\n\n"
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				out += "### Simple Interest vs Compound Interest (Daily)\n\n"
				out += "| Period | Simple Interest | Compound Interest |\n"
				out += "|--------|-----------------|-------------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple), formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple), formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple), formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[500](%s:500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5,000](%s:5000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Select amount → APR → commission to see results*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

package photon8ball1

import (
	"encoding/base64"
	"time"
)

var (
	responses = []string{
		"Absolutely - PHOTON is the way",
		"Without a doubt, anon",
		"YESS MOOOONBOIIII",
		"ATONE+GNO+PHOTON, How are you not buying!!",

		"All signs point to SELL THE HOUSE",
		"IF YOU GNO, YOU GNO",
		"Definitely yes - Don't be Soft",
		"100% - don't fade Jae",
		"Yes - ngmi if you don't",
		"Yes! Don't make me call your wife",
		"Absolutely bullish - load the truck",
		"YES!! (insert BS Technical Analysis)",
		"Yes, in Jae we Trust",
		"Yes - this is the alpha",
		"1B MAX MARKET CAP, YES!",
		"ATONE_BURN_INTENSITY_FACTOR SAYS YES!",
		"Incredibly likely - moon mission duh",
		"FK SEND IT",
		"Yes - few understand this",
	}
)

func getAnswer() string {
	// Get both seconds and nanoseconds for better randomness
	now := time.Now().Unix()
	nano := time.Now().UnixNano()
	
	// Mix them together with prime number multiplication for better distribution
	mixed := (now * 1103515245 + nano/1000000) % int64(len(responses))
	idx := int(mixed)
	
	// Ensure it's positive
	if idx < 0 {
		idx = -idx
	}
	
	return responses[idx]
}

func createAnswerBox(answer string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<!-- Background -->
		<rect width="800" height="300" fill="#2D1B69"/>
		
		<!-- Inner glow -->
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="260" fill="#3D2B79" rx="15"/>
		
		<!-- Border -->
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="260" fill="none" stroke="#7B3FF2" stroke-width="4" rx="15"/>
		
		<!-- Title -->
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#00FFFF" font-size="28" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			🔮 THE PHOTON ORACLE 🔮
		</text>
		
		<!-- Decorative lines -->
		<rect x="100" y="90" width="600" height="2" fill="#7B3FF2"/>
		<rect x="100" y="220" width="600" height="2" fill="#7B3FF2"/>
		
		<!-- Answer text -->
		<text x="400" y="165" fill="#00FF88" font-size="22" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + answer + `
		</text>
		
		<!-- Star decorations -->
		<circle cx="80" cy="155" r="3" fill="#FFD700"/>
		<circle cx="720" cy="155" r="3" fill="#FFD700"/>
		<circle cx="400" cy="250" r="3" fill="#FFD700"/>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Answer Box](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createClickButton() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<!-- Background -->
		<rect width="800" height="300" fill="#2D1B69"/>
		
		<!-- Inner box -->
		<rect x="50" y="50" width="700" height="200" fill="#3D2B79" rx="15"/>
		
		<!-- Border -->
		<rect x="50" y="50" width="700" height="200" fill="none" stroke="#7B3FF2" stroke-width="6" rx="15"/>
		
		<!-- Line 1 -->
		<text x="400" y="110" fill="#00FFFF" font-size="36" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			SHOULD I BUY PHOTON?
		</text>
		
		<!-- Line 2 -->
		<text x="400" y="170" fill="#00FF88" font-size="42" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			CLICK HERE TO FIND OUT!!
		</text>
		
		<!-- Emoji decorations -->
		<text x="120" y="230" font-size="40">🎱</text>
		<text x="650" y="230" font-size="40">🔮</text>
		
		<!-- Stars -->
		<circle cx="100" cy="80" r="4" fill="#FFD700"/>
		<circle cx="700" cy="80" r="4" fill="#FFD700"/>
		<circle cx="100" cy="220" r="4" fill="#FFD700"/>
		<circle cx="700" cy="220" r="4" fill="#FFD700"/>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := "/r/g1pn94kaqqstuf7fnhc9ymjegn7nz4kwccpjljqe/photon8ball1"
	
	out := "# 📈 THE PHOTON Magic 8-BALL\n\n"
	
	if path == "ask" {
		answer := getAnswer()
		
		out += createAnswerBox(answer)
		out += "\n\n"
		out += "[🎱 Should I Buy Again?](" + realmPath + ":ask) | [🏠 Home](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
	} else {
		// Show clickable button box
		buttonImage := createClickButton()
		out += "[![Click to Ask](" + buttonImage + ")](" + realmPath + ":ask)\n\n"
		out += "*Nothing to Lose! 100% FREE alpha!*\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*⚠️ NFA    (THEY ALL YES YOU CLOWNS 🤡)*"
	
	return out
}
