files.body:
package sv21

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createHeader() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="120" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="#ffffff" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="none" stroke="#cbd5e0" stroke-width="3" rx="12"/>
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#2d3748" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Staking Rewards Calculator
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Header](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createResultsBox(amount, apr, apy, commission string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="180" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="#edf2f7" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" rx="12"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Amount: ` + amount + ` tokens
		</text>
		<text x="50" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APR: ` + apr + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APY: ` + apy + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Commission: ` + commission + `%
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="105" width="720" height="2" fill="#cbd5e0"/>
		<text x="400" y="135" fill="#4299e1" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily Compounding Active
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Results](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Bonus: +` + bonus + ` tokens/year
		</text>
		<text x="650" y="55" fill="#38a169" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			(+` + percent + `%)
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Bonus](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createSelectionBox(title, subtitle string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="80" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="80" fill="#fffbeb"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#fbbf24" stroke-width="2" rx="8"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="35" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + title + `
		</text>
		<text x="400" y="55" fill="#b45309" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + subtitle + `
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Selection](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="160" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += "## Your Staking Rewards\n\n"
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "| Period | Simple Interest | Compound Interest |\n"
				out += "|--------|-----------------|-------------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple), formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple), formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple), formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[500](%s:500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5,000](%s:5000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Select amount → APR → commission to see results*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

files.body:
package sv22

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createHeader() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="120" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="#ffffff" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="none" stroke="#cbd5e0" stroke-width="3" rx="12"/>
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#2d3748" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Staking Rewards Calculator
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Header](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

	svg := `<svg width="800" height="180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="#edf2f7" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" rx="12"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Amount: ` + amount + ` tokens
		</text>
		<text x="50" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APR: ` + apr + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APY: ` + apy + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Commission: ` + commission + `%
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="105" width="720" height="2" fill="#cbd5e0"/>
		<text x="400" y="135" fill="#4299e1" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily Compounding Active
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Results](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Bonus: +` + bonus + ` tokens/year
		</text>
		<text x="650" y="55" fill="#38a169" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			(+` + percent + `%)
		</text>

	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))

}

func createSelectionBox(title, subtitle string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="80" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="80" fill="#fffbeb"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#fbbf24" stroke-width="2" rx="8"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="35" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + title + `
		</text>
		<text x="400" y="55" fill="#b45309" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + subtitle + `
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))

}

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="160" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "| Period | Simple Interest | Compound Interest |\n"
				out += "|--------|-----------------|-------------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple), formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple), formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple), formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[500](%s:500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5,000](%s:5000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Select amount → APR → commission to see results*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

files.body:
package sv23

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createHeader() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="120" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="#ffffff" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="none" stroke="#cbd5e0" stroke-width="3" rx="12"/>
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#2d3748" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Staking Rewards Calculator
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Header](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createResultsBox(amount, apr, apy, commission string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="180" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="#edf2f7" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" rx="12"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Amount: ` + amount + ` tokens
		</text>
		<text x="50" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APR: ` + apr + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APY: ` + apy + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Commission: ` + commission + `%
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="105" width="720" height="2" fill="#cbd5e0"/>
		<text x="400" y="135" fill="#4299e1" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily Compounding Active
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Results](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Bonus: +` + bonus + ` tokens/year
		</text>
		<text x="650" y="55" fill="#38a169" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			(+` + percent + `%)
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Bonus](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createSelectionBox(title, subtitle string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="80" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="80" fill="#fffbeb"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#fbbf24" stroke-width="2" rx="8"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="35" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + title + `
		</text>
		<text x="400" y="55" fill="#b45309" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + subtitle + `
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Selection](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="160" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "| Period | No Compounding | Daily Compounding |\n"
				out += "|--------|-----------------|-------------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple), formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple), formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple), formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250](%s:250)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[500](%s:500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[2,500](%s:2500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5,000](%s:5000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[25,000](%s:25000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Step 1: Amount → Step 2: APR → Step 3: Commission*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

package staking_calculator

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

    "gno.land/r/leon/hor"
	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func init() {
	hor.Register(
		cross, 
		"Staking Rewards Calculator", 
		"Calculate your staking rewards with different compounding frequencies.",
	)
}

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">

		</text>

		<rect width="800" height="80" fill="#fffbeb"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>

			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "| Period | No Compounding | Daily Compounding |\n"
				out += "|--------|-----------------|-------------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple), formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple), formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple), formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250](%s:250)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[500](%s:500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[2,500](%s:2500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5,000](%s:5000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[25,000](%s:25000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Step 1: Amount → Step 2: APR → Step 3: Commission*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

package staking_compounding_calculator

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

    "gno.land/r/leon/hor"
	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)
func init() {
	hor.Register(cross, "Staking Compounding Calculator", "Calculate your staking rewards with different compounding frequencies. Compare daily, weekly, and monthly compounding with APY calculations.")
}

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createHeader() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="120" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="#ffffff" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="none" stroke="#cbd5e0" stroke-width="3" rx="12"/>
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#2d3748" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Staking Rewards Calculator
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Header](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createResultsBox(amount, apr, apy, commission string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="180" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="#edf2f7" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" rx="12"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Amount: ` + amount + ` tokens
		</text>
		<text x="50" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APR: ` + apr + `%
		</text>

			APY: ` + apy + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Commission: ` + commission + `%
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="105" width="720" height="2" fill="#cbd5e0"/>
		<text x="400" y="135" fill="#4299e1" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily Compounding Active
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Results](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Bonus: +` + bonus + ` tokens/year
		</text>
		<text x="650" y="55" fill="#38a169" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			(+` + percent + `%)
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Bonus](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createSelectionBox(title, subtitle string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="80" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="80" fill="#fffbeb"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="#fef3c7" rx="8"/>
		<rect x="10" y="10" width="780" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#fbbf24" stroke-width="2" rx="8"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="35" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + title + `
		</text>
		<text x="400" y="55" fill="#b45309" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			` + subtitle + `
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Selection](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createComparisonBox(dailyAPY, weeklyAPY, monthlyAPY, dailyWeek, dailyMonth, dailyYear, weeklyWeek, weeklyMonth, weeklyYear, monthlyWeek, monthlyMonth, monthlyYear string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="280" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="280" fill="#fef3c7"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="#fffbeb" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="240" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="400" y="50" fill="#92400e" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Compounding Frequency Comparison
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="60" width="720" height="2" fill="#fbbf24"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="90" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily (APY: ` + dailyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="110" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + dailyWeek + ` | Month: ` + dailyMonth + ` | Year: ` + dailyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="140" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Weekly (APY: ` + weeklyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="160" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + weeklyWeek + ` | Month: ` + weeklyMonth + ` | Year: ` + weeklyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
		
		<text x="50" y="190" fill="#78350f" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Monthly (APY: ` + monthlyAPY + `%)
		</text>
		<text x="70" y="210" fill="#92400e" font-size="13" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Week: ` + monthlyWeek + ` | Month: ` + monthlyMonth + ` | Year: ` + monthlyYear + ` tokens
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Comparison](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func Render(path string) string {
	realmPath := strings.TrimPrefix(runtime.CurrentRealm().PkgPath(), runtime.ChainDomain())
	
	out := createHeader() + "\n\n"
	out += "---\n\n"
	
	// Check if we have results to display
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) >= 3 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			commission := parseFloat(parts[2])
			
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 && commission >= 0 {
				dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly := calculateRewards(amount, apr, commission)
				
				out += createResultsBox(formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr), formatNumber(apy), formatNumber(commission)) + "\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				
				diff := yearlyComp - yearlySimple
				percentIncrease := (diff / yearlySimple) * 100.0
				out += createBonusBox(formatWithCommas(diff), formatNumber(percentIncrease)) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "| Period | No Compounding | Daily Compounding |\n"
				out += "|--------|-----------------|-------------------|\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Daily | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(dailySimple), formatWithCommas(dailyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Monthly | %s | %s |\n", formatWithCommas(monthlySimple), formatWithCommas(monthlyComp))
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("| Yearly | %s | %s |\n\n", formatWithCommas(yearlySimple), formatWithCommas(yearlyComp))
				
				out += createComparisonBox(
					formatNumber(apy), 
					formatNumber(apyWeekly), 
					formatNumber(apyMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompDaily),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyComp),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompWeek),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyWeekly),
					formatWithCommas(weeklyCompMonth),
					formatWithCommas(monthlyCompMonthly),
					formatWithCommas(yearlyMonthly),
				) + "\n\n"
				
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[🔄 Calculate Again](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
				return out
			}
		}
	}
	
	// Check if amount is selected (step 2 - APR)
	if path != "" {
		parts := strings.Split(path, "/")
		if len(parts) == 1 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			if amount > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 2: Select APR", "Choose your annual percentage rate (1-100%)") + "\n\n"
				
				// Generate 1-100 in rows of 20
				for row := 0; row < 5; row++ {
					out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
					start := row * 20 + 1
					end := start + 20
					if end > 101 {
						end = 101
					}
					for i := start; i < end; i++ {
						out += ufmt.Sprintf("[%d%%](%s:%s/%d)", i, realmPath, parts[0], i)
						if i < end-1 {
							out += " | "
						}
					}
					out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				}
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		} else if len(parts) == 2 {
			amount := parseFloat(parts[0])
			apr := parseFloat(parts[1])
			if amount > 0 && apr > 0 {
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("**Selected: %s tokens @ %s%% APR**\n\n", formatWithCommas(amount), formatNumber(apr))
				out += createSelectionBox("Step 3: Select Commission", "Choose your validator commission rate") + "\n\n"
				out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[0%% (Low)](%s:%s/%s/0)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5%% (Standard)](%s:%s/%s/5)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += " | "
				out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10%% (High)](%s:%s/%s/10)", realmPath, parts[0], parts[1])
				out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
				out += "---\n\n"
				out += "[← Start Over](" + realmPath + ")\n\n"
			}
		}
	} else {
		// Only show Step 1 if nothing is selected yet
		out += createSelectionBox("Step 1: Select Stake Amount", "Choose how many tokens you want to stake") + "\n\n"
		out += "<gno-columns>\n\n"
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10](%s:10)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100](%s:100)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250](%s:250)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[500](%s:500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000](%s:1000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[2,500](%s:2500)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[5,000](%s:5000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[10,000](%s:10000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[25,000](%s:25000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[50,000](%s:50000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[100,000](%s:100000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[250,000](%s:250000)", realmPath)
		out += " | "
		out += ufmt.Sprintf("[1,000,000](%s:1000000)", realmPath)
		out += "\n\n</gno-columns>\n\n"
	}
	
	out += "---\n\n"
	out += "*Step 1: Amount → Step 2: APR → Step 3: Commission*\n"
	
	return out
}

func parseFloat(s string) float64 {
	parts := strings.Split(s, ".")
	if len(parts) == 0 {
		return 0
	}
	
	intPart := 0.0
	for i := 0; i < len(parts[0]); i++ {
		if parts[0][i] >= '0' && parts[0][i] <= '9' {
			intPart = intPart*10 + float64(parts[0][i]-'0')
		}
	}
	
	decPart := 0.0
	if len(parts) == 2 {
		divisor := 1.0
		for i := 0; i < len(parts[1]) && i < 6; i++ {
			if parts[1][i] >= '0' && parts[1][i] <= '9' {
				divisor *= 10
				decPart = decPart*10 + float64(parts[1][i]-'0')
			}
		}
		decPart = decPart / divisor
	}
	
	return intPart + decPart
}

files.body:
package staking_compounding_calculatorv1

import (
	"chain/runtime"
	"encoding/base64"
	"strings"

	"gno.land/r/leon/hor"
	"gno.land/p/nt/ufmt"
)

func init() {
	hor.Register(cross, "Staking Compounding Calculator", "Calculate your staking rewards with different compounding frequencies. Compare daily, weekly, and monthly compounding with APY calculations.")
}

func calculateRewards(amount float64, apr float64, commission float64) (daily, monthly, yearly, dailyComp, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyComp, yearlyComp, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly float64) {
	effectiveAPR := apr * (1.0 - commission/100.0) / 100.0
	
	yearlySimple := amount * effectiveAPR
	monthlySimple := yearlySimple / 12.0
	dailySimple := yearlySimple / 365.0
	
	// Daily compounding
	n := 365.0
	finalAmount := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n)
	yearlyCompound := finalAmount - amount
	apy = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	monthlyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/12.0)
	monthlyCompound := monthlyFinal - amount
	
	weeklyFinalDaily := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/52.0)
	weeklyCompDaily = weeklyFinalDaily - amount
	
	dailyFinal := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/n, n/365.0)
	dailyCompound := dailyFinal - amount
	
	// Weekly compounding
	nWeekly := 52.0
	finalAmountWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly)
	yearlyWeekly = finalAmountWeekly - amount
	apyWeekly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalWeek := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, 1.0)
	weeklyCompWeek = weeklyFinalWeek - amount
	
	monthlyFinalWeekly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nWeekly, nWeekly/12.0)
	monthlyCompWeekly = monthlyFinalWeekly - amount
	
	// Monthly compounding
	nMonthly := 12.0
	finalAmountMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly)
	yearlyMonthly = finalAmountMonthly - amount
	apyMonthly = (power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly) - 1.0) * 100.0
	
	weeklyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, nMonthly/52.0)
	weeklyCompMonth = weeklyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	monthlyFinalMonthly := amount * power(1.0 + effectiveAPR/nMonthly, 1.0)
	monthlyCompMonthly = monthlyFinalMonthly - amount
	
	return dailySimple, monthlySimple, yearlySimple, dailyCompound, weeklyCompDaily, monthlyCompound, yearlyCompound, apy, weeklyCompWeek, monthlyCompWeekly, yearlyWeekly, apyWeekly, weeklyCompMonth, monthlyCompMonthly, yearlyMonthly, apyMonthly
}

func power(base float64, exp float64) float64 {
	if exp == 0 {
		return 1.0
	}
	
	result := 1.0
	intExp := int(exp)
	for i := 0; i < intExp; i++ {
		result *= base
	}
	
	fracExp := exp - float64(intExp)
	if fracExp > 0.001 {
		x := base - 1.0
		result *= (1.0 + fracExp*x)
	}
	
	return result
}

func formatNumber(num float64) string {
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func formatWithCommas(num float64) string {
	// Format the number to 2 decimal places
	str := ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
	
	// Split into integer and decimal parts
	parts := strings.Split(str, ".")
	intPart := parts[0]
	decPart := ""
	if len(parts) > 1 {
		decPart = "." + parts[1]
	}
	
	// Add commas to integer part
	var result strings.Builder
	length := len(intPart)
	for i, digit := range intPart {
		if i > 0 && (length-i)%3 == 0 {
			result.WriteString(",")
		}
		result.WriteByte(byte(digit))
	}
	
	return result.String() + decPart
}

func formatLargeNumber(num float64) string {
	if num >= 1000 {
		return formatWithCommas(num)
	}
	return ufmt.Sprintf("%.2f", num)
}

func createHeader() string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="120" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="#ffffff" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="80" fill="none" stroke="#cbd5e0" stroke-width="3" rx="12"/>
		<text x="400" y="70" fill="#2d3748" font-size="32" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Staking Rewards Calculator
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Header](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createResultsBox(amount, apr, apy, commission string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="180" fill="#f7fafc"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="#edf2f7" rx="12"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="140" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" rx="12"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Amount: ` + amount + ` tokens
		</text>
		<text x="50" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">

		</text>
		<text x="450" y="55" fill="#2d3748" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			APY: ` + apy + `%
		</text>
		<text x="450" y="85" fill="#4a5568" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Commission: ` + commission + `%
		</text>
		
		<rect x="40" y="105" width="720" height="2" fill="#cbd5e0"/>
		<text x="400" y="135" fill="#4299e1" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
			Daily Compounding Active
		</text>
	</svg>`
	
	encoded := base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString([]byte(svg))
	return "![Results](data:image/svg+xml;base64," + encoded + ")"
}

func createBonusBox(bonus, percent string) string {
	svg := `<svg width="800" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
		<rect width="800" height="100" fill="#f0fff4"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="#c6f6d5" rx="10"/>
		<rect x="20" y="20" width="760" height="60" fill="none" stroke="#9ae6b4" stroke-width="2" rx="10"/>
		
		<text x="50" y="55" fill="#2f855a" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">
